gobblin.config.store.hdfs

Class SimpleHDFSStoreMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.config.store.hdfs.SimpleHDFSStoreMetadata

  • public class SimpleHDFSStoreMetadata
extends Object
    A metadata accessor for an HDFS based ConfigStore. A HDFS based ConfigStore will have a file named CONFIG_STORE_METADATA_FILENAME that contains store metadata as key/value pairs. This class helps adding more key/value pairs to the store metadata file and helps reading key/value pairs from the store metadata file. For instance the current active version of the store is stored at CONFIG_STORE_METADATA_CURRENT_VERSION_KEY.

    • Method Detail

      • writeMetadata

        void writeMetadata(Config config)
            throws IOException
        Writes the config to storeMetadataFilePath. Creates a backup file at storeMetadataFilePath + ".bkp" to recover old metadata in case of unexpected deployment failures
        Parameters:
        config - to be serialized
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was any problem writing the config to the store metadata file.
